job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Bose Corporation is a leading innovator in the field of automotive audio systems and we are successfully extending our market leadership in all areas of automotive audio systems. A key to this success lies in how Bose optimizes the design of each system to the unique electro-acoustic characteristics of each vehicle.  The successful candidate for this position will join our Automotive Systems Division, Systems Software & Tools Team, developing the tools that enable Bose tuning engineers to deliver incredible, immersive in-cabin audio experiences. The work centers around delivering new features developed within our research teams to our tuning engineers for automotive production.  This software engineer will develop and support a suite of tools responsible for aspects of audio processing, rendering, and deployment - think of it like our own DAW and plugin set. They will be responsible for the entire development process - requirements gathering, development, testing, and providing tool training and documentation. BS/MS degree is required in the field of computer science (preferred), software engineering, or electrical engineering.  Expected years of experience: 10+ years  Bose is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected characteristics.
